snippet: Creating your own Web site or otherwise displaying your work online can help you stand out in the eyes of potential employers.
abstract: Eilene Zimmerman Career Couch column suggests that creating one's own Web site or otherwise displaying one's work online can help a person stand out in the eyes of potential employers; offers tips on what constitutes a good Web site for job seekers.
lead_paragraph: Creating your own Web site or otherwise displaying your work online can help you stand out in the eyes of potential employers.

headline.seo: An Online Portfolio Can Showcase Your Work - Career Couch
headline.main: Showcasing Your Work, in an Online Portfolio
headline.print_headline: Showcasing Your Work, In an Online Portfolio
